AddonDescription.message: Adds socionics type after known names on a page

Instructions.message: Fill in the type and person list in the text box (see the example below), and click on "Save".

ExampleContent.message:
# You can write notes on lines that start with a hash symbol,
# they will be ignored for text replacement.

IEI
- Barack Obama
- Hans Christian Andersen

# Each person name goes on its own line,
# prefixed by "-" or "*":

LSI
* Hillary Clinton
* Vladimir Putin


# Empty lines have no effect on the replacer.
# Types may be repeated (with a different list of people):
IEI
- Mother Teresa
